title: Verified Purchase
content: This utensil is a little handy gadget that does quite a few things. At first I didn't think it would be a good idea to have a single utility item in my kitchen. I need my stuff to do a variety of things not just one. This does it. It's main job right now is breaking up ground meat for the dishes that I eat. I used to use a bamboo stirrer break up the meat. But that meant beating up the meat in the frying pan. That was noisy and was probably damaging to the burner connection on the electric stove. This little gadget does it more gently, quieter, less jarringl, more quickly, and more efficiently than anything else that I've tried. It doesn't melt into my food, is easy to clean, and it can be kept in the utensil drawer. It mashes and breaks apart potatoes and veggies and eggs and strawberries and helps shred meats like beef and pork roasts for tacos and enchiladas,too. It efficiently does the job, it's a very handy utensil to have. It has my recommendation.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: I am using Hello Fresh and the meals I choose often have ground beef, pork, etc and it tells you to break it up in the pan. Using a spatula, this means a ton of doing rows and columns and still not getting it properly broken into smaller pieces than that. So I happened to see a TikTok with a child-genius cook and he used some tool to help him break up the ground meat. I found this on Amazon and ordered it. It takes very little effort to break up a ton of ground meat into tiny pieces. I love it. My only issue is that some meat clings to it and you have to really make sure all of the meat gets out of it. But I bought it to make my life easier to break up ground meat and it does that perfectly.
